Sentencas: High-temperature reaction calorimetry using molten lead borate as a solvent has been used to study the thermochemistry of La(1-x)A(x)MnO(3)
Titulo: Enthalpies of formation of La1-xAxMnO3±δ (A = Ca and Sr) measured by high-temperature solution calorimetry

Sentencas: (A = Ca and Sr, 0 less than or equal to x less than or equal to 1).
Titulo: Enthalpies of formation of La1-xAxMnO3±δ (A = Ca and Sr) measured by high-temperature solution calorimetry

Sentencas: The structural properties and the oxygen stoichiometry of the calcined powders were characterized by powder X-ray diffraction, thermogravimetry, and iodometry.
Titulo: Enthalpies of formation of La1-xAxMnO3±δ (A = Ca and Sr) measured by high-temperature solution calorimetry

Sentencas: The enthalpy of formation of the materials from their binary constituents has been calculated from measured enthalpy of solutions.
Titulo: Enthalpies of formation of La1-xAxMnO3±δ (A = Ca and Sr) measured by high-temperature solution calorimetry

Sentencas: The enthalpy of formation of La1-xCaxMnO3 from the component oxides becomes more exothermic with increasing substitution level x due to the increasing valence state of Mn, and demonstrates a nearly linear dependence of the average valence state of manganese.
Titulo: Enthalpies of formation of La1-xAxMnO3±δ (A = Ca and Sr) measured by high-temperature solution calorimetry

Sentencas: La1-xSrxMnO3 has a significantly more exothermic enthalpy of formation from the binary constituents than the Ca-substituted materials, and demonstrates a negative deviation from ideal behavior.
Titulo: Enthalpies of formation of La1-xAxMnO3±δ (A = Ca and Sr) measured by high-temperature solution calorimetry

Sentencas: The present thermodynamic data are discussed in relation to the Goldschmidt tolerance factor for the perovskite structure.
Titulo: Enthalpies of formation of La1-xAxMnO3±δ (A = Ca and Sr) measured by high-temperature solution calorimetry

Sentencas: Finally, the phase stability of Sr- and Ca-substituted LaMnO3 is addressed in relation to the application of these materials in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Enthalpies of formation of La1-xAxMnO3±δ (A = Ca and Sr) measured by high-temperature solution calorimetry
